definitions.definition: The act of confining , or the state of being confined; imprisonment .
A strangulation , as in a hernia .
A constriction of the hernial sac , rendering it irreducible, but not great enough to cause strangulation .

main_definition: ( chiefly US ) The act of confining , or the state of being confined; imprisonment .
secondary_definitions: ( surgery , dated ) A strangulation , as in a hernia .
A constriction of the hernial sac , rendering it irreducible, but not great enough to cause strangulation .
